messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Digest Number 226
messages.msgSnippet: You, my dear, just made my day. I haven t slept a wink at all last night and this was a very -very- nice caffeine substitute XD Woooh! HOT! [ What brought
messages.messageBody:
You, my dear, just made my day. I haven't slept a wink at all last night and this was a very -very- nice caffeine substitute XD Woooh! HOT!

[ What brought about this fic? Well remember episode 16-17 where the unforgettable Kichisaburou appeared in the Okita Impersonator arc? Yes, yes, thats it. I vividly remember Toshi saying something to this effect: Souji? It cant be. He was in my room until late at night. And then there were the naughty thoughts: what were they doing? ]

*snicker* You did the episode justice. Thank god for people like you.

Whoever thought Kichisaburou was good for -something-, ne?


Write more!


~Kane


---------------------------------
